quotes.text: May the Force be with you
I find your lack of faith disturbing
Do or do not, there is no try
There is no spoon
Follow the white rabbit
You take the red pill, you stay in Wonderland
Not all those who wander are lost
One does not simply walk into Mordor
My other ride is an eagle
It is a truth universally acknowledged...
I could easily forgive his pride...
You must allow me to tell you how ardently...
It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live
I solemnly swear I am up to no good
Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times
I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse
Leave the gun, take the cannoli
Keep your friends close, but your enemies closer
Fear is the mind-killer
Bless the Maker and His water
The spice must flow
So we beat on, boats against the current...
I hope she'll be a foolâ€”that's the best thing...
You can't repeat the past
You mustn't be afraid to dream a little bigger
We need to go deeper
An idea is like a virus
Big Brother is watching you
War is peace. Freedom is slavery.
Who controls the past controls the future
Get busy living, or get busy dying
Hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things
Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free
You never really understand a person until...
The one thing that doesn't abide by majority rule...
People generally see what they look for
Why so serious?
You either die a hero, or live long enough...
Some men just want to watch the world burn
